title: Eggless Nutella, French Toast Sticks Recipe ( Egg Option is also Included)
content:
I spread some Nutella over the bread and coated it with an eggless custard mix and fried it. It was delicious. Instead of the custard powder mix, you can use egg coating as well. 

I hope you will give this a try and let me know how it turns out for you.

 

Preparation Time: 5 mins

Cooking Time: 2 to 3 mins

Serves: 2

 

Ingredients:

 

Bread Slices – 4 to 6

Nutella – 3 tablespoon or as needed

Unsalted Butter – 2 tablespoon

 

For Eggless French Toast Coating: 

Custard Powder – 2 tablespoon

Sugar – 1.5 tablespoon

Milk – 1/2 cup

Vanilla Essence – 1/2 tsp

 

OR

 

For Egg French Toast Coating:

Egg – 1 

Sugar – 1 tablespoon

Milk – 1/2 cup

Vanilla Essence – 1 tsp

 

Method:

Take bread slices, cut the crust off, spread 1.5 tablespoons of Nutella onto each slice and spread it evenly. Now cover with another slice and cut it into fingers or sticks.

Mix all the ingredients given for coating. 

Melt butter in a pan for frying.

Take each stick and dip in the coating, put it over the butter and fry them for 2 to 3 mins till golden on both sides, cook on low heat.

Remove and cool little and serve.

recommendations.title: Beetroot milk Recipe, Rose milk using Beetroots
recommendations.content:
Delicious rose milk made using beetroots. This is healthy for kids and toddlers. Instead of giving normal rose milk with lots of food coloring, you can give this beet milk.
